content:
Yes, here is a sample of Cucumber-based user stories and test cases for the sign-up process for a Pinterest-like application:

User Story:
```css
As a user, I want to sign up for the Pinterest-like application so that I can create boards and save pins.
```
Test Cases:

1. Verify that the sign-up button is present and visible on the home page
2. Verify that the sign-up form can be accessed by clicking the sign-up button
3. Verify that the sign-up form requires a valid email address and password
4. Verify that the password must meet the minimum length and complexity requirements
5. Verify that the user can select a username that is unique and meets the requirements
6. Verify that the user can select a profile picture if they wish to do so
7. Verify that the user can agree to the terms of service and privacy policy
8. Verify that the user can submit the sign-up form
9. Verify that the user is redirected to their profile page after successful sign-up
10. Verify that the user's information is saved and accessible in their profile.

Cucumber Scenario:
```vbnet
Scenario: Sign up for Pinterest-like application
  Given the user is on the home page
  When the user clicks the sign-up button
  And the user enters a valid email address and password
  And the user selects a unique username
  And the user selects a profile picture if desired
  And the user agrees to the terms of service and privacy policy
  And the user submits the sign-up form
  Then the user is redirected to their profile page
  And the user's information is saved and accessible in their profile
```
